caller_intent: Sandra is being contacted by Jeremy from Alliance Insurance to gather information for a home and auto insurance policy renewal. The agent is collecting details about the property, deductible preferences, home updates, and vehicle information to finalize the quote.
resolution_steps: Jeremy asks about home features (pool, trampoline, recent updates, roof year, alarm system, pets).
Inquires about mortgage status, electrical systems, HVAC, water source, and claims history.
Confirms auto insurance details (vehicles, comprehensive coverage, driving frequency).
Agrees to input data into the system and provide a quote by the next business day.
knowledge_required: Home insurance underwriting factors (deductibles, roof age, alarm systems, pets).
Auto insurance details (comprehensive coverage, vehicle information).
Policy renewal processes and carrier systems.
systems_referenced: Internal system for processing insurance data
summary: Jeremy from Alliance Insurance collects detailed information from Sandra about her home and auto insurance policies to prepare a renewal quote. Key details include home features, deductible preferences, roof age, and payment method. The agent commits to providing a quote by the next business day.
